page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ROBBIE
page.content: I WAKE UP AT 8 O CLOCK.I USUALLY FLING THE CONTINENTAL QUILT TO THE BOTTOM OF THE BED AND GET MY CLOTHES ON.MY BREAKFAST IS MOSTLY A BACON ROLL OR RICE CRISPIES.I GET MY PIECE MONEY. IT IS USUALLY 13 PENCE.AS I GO OUT THE DOOR I BRUSH MY HAIR. I RUN UP TO JIM AND LESLIES HOUSE AND CATCH THE BUS WHICH TAKES ME TO SCHOOL. AT THE SCHOOL ON MONDAY WE GET GYM,ON THURSDAY WE GET MUSIC AND ON FRIDAY I GET FIDDLE.AT THE MOMENT WE ARE DOING " THE DOMSDAY PROJECT." AFTER I HAVE MY TEA I SOMETIMES FEED THE SHEEP,OR GO OUT IN A SMALL BOAT.IF ITS A FINE DAY I GO TO HAVRA,AN ISLAND WHERE WE KEEP SHEEP.SOMETIMES I WATCH T.V TILL BED TIME AT 10 O CLOCK. MY HOBBIES ARE THE BOYS BRIGADE, FOOTBALL AND YOUTH CLUB.
